AggregatedSavedViewSpec.description: Spec for saved views that visualize aggregated data.

visualization.description: Information about the visualization of the saved view.

colorPalette.description: The file path to the color palette definition.

showOther.description: Flag indicating whether unfiltered items should be displayed in an "Other" group when a breakout is active.

stack.description: The stacking type, when using an "area", "bar", or "line" chart).

showAxisLabels.description: Whether to show the axis labels when using an "area", "bar", or "line" chart

missingValuesBehavior.description: Whether to show missing values for a "bar" chart

legend.description: The position of the chart legend when using an "area", "bar", "line" or horizontal bar chart

tableColor.description: A gradient table color to be used in conjunction with table calculations in a "pivot" chart

padding.description: The amount of table padding to apply in a "pivot" or "table" chart

showBarLabels.description: Whether to show labels in a "horizontal bar" chart

tableVisualization.description: Cell visualizations for table or pivot charts

tableCellFormatting.description: Cell formatting for table or pivot charts

data.description: Information about the data of the saved view.

x.description: One or more columns to use as the x axis in the visualization. (Specifying multiple columns is only applicable when using a Table visualization.)

y.description: One or more columns to use as the y axis in the visualization. (Specifying multiple columns is only applicable when using a Table visualization.)

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column.

name.description: The user-visible name of this metric.

items.description: Specifies a column to use as a y axis.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column.

name.description: The user-visible name of this metric.

breakout.description: Specifies a color breakout to display in the visualization.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column used for the breakout.

groups.description: The list of values to group by.

index.description: The ordering to use when displaying this group (starting with 0).

color.description: The color of this breakout group

trellis.description: Specifies a trellis breakout to display in the visualization.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column used for the breakout.

showOther.description: If true, will collect any values not in `groups` under an "Other" group. Defaults to `true`.

groups.description: The list of values to group by.

filters.description: Specifies filters that are applied by default in this view.

grn.description: The persistent identifier for this saved view.

name.description: The user-visible name of this saved view.

type.description: The type of this resource, which in this case should always be "saved_view".

model.description: The file path to the data model definition.

hidden.description: A list of attribute column identifiers to hide in this view.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column.

granularity.description: Which granularity to use when aggregating data, if this is a datetime column.

bins.description: Specifies binning options for a numeric column.

binWidth.description: The bin width for grouping data from this column.

binsEnabled.description: If binsEnabled is omitted, bins will still be enabled.

y.description: A metric, if specified, that will be used in the metric on the sidebar.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column.

name.description: The user-visible name of this metric.

items.description: Specifies a column to use as a y axis.

columnId.description: The column identifier of the column.

name.description: The user-visible name of this metric.

limit.description: Specifies how many records to load and show. Only supported by the source_data_table visualization.

filters.description: Specifies filters that are applied by default in this view.

grn.description: The persistent identifier for this saved view.

name.description: The user-visible name of this saved view.

type.description: The type of this resource, which in this case should always be "saved_view".

model.description: The file path to the data model definition.

hidden.description: A list of attribute column identifiers to hide in this view.
